title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: The Strickler Hat
content:
For players yet to dip their toes in the waters of this island paradise, take a trip to The Music Locker located at The Diamond Casino & Resort to get started, and enjoy a 30% discount on the Kosatka submarine available from Warstock Cache & Carry.

Make it through The Cayo Perico Heist this week without dying to complete the Weekly Challenge and receive the Strickler Hat and a bonus GTA$100,000.
